record.title: DESIGNATING SENATOR JAY ROCKEFELLER AS CHAIRMAN OF THE SELECT COMMITTEE ON INTELLIGENCE

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, in accordance with the provisions of S. Res. 445 of the 108th Congress, I designate Senator Jay Rockefeller as chairman of the Select Committee on Intelligence.

Mr. President, we have done this very quickly, but it is extremely important that we have been able to accomplish this. There has been a lot of cooperation on both sides. It puts us on the path to get some things done with the committees. I think the chairman and ranking members are happy, as we have learned today.
